Definition.WordDefinition: Lapel, IN (town, FIPS 42228) Location: 40.06885 N, 85.84755 W Population (1990): 1742 (712 housing units) Area: 1.1 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 46051

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Lapel \La*pel"\, n. [Dim. of lap a fold.] That part of a garment which is turned back; specifically, the lap, or fold, of the front of a coat in continuation of collar. [Written also {lappel} and {lapelle}.] [1913 Webster]
lapel n : lap at the front of a coat; continuation of the coat collar
